props.disabled: Puts all children inputs into a disabled state.
props.lazyValidation: If enabled, **value** will always be _true_ unless there are visible validation errors. You can still call `validate()` to manually trigger validation
props.readonly: Puts all children inputs into a readonly state.
props.value: A boolean value representing the validity of the form.

functions.reset: Resets the state of all registered inputs (inside the form) to **{}** for arrays and **null** for all other values. Resets errors bag when using the **lazy-validation** prop.
functions.resetValidation: Resets validation of all registered inputs without modifying their state
functions.validate: Validates all registered inputs. Returns **true** if successful and **false** if not
